name: sd_large_count_saturates_region
description: SD count larger than region height saturates to full-region blanking without touching rows outside
comment: Fill rows 0..4 with A..E at col 0. Set DECSTBM(2,4) -> region rows 1..3 (height 3). SD(10) should clamp to region height: rows 1..3 become blank; row 0 and row 4 remain A and E.
